General.Name: Ezfly International Travel Agent Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Ezfly International Travel Agent Co., Ltd. an online ticket booking mechanism in Taiwan. The company offers ticket purchase and booking services; and sells domestic air tickets, foreign individual air tickets, and foreign group air tickets. It also provides domestic and international room reservation, group travel, mini tour, group and airline free travel, and theme tickets, as well as foreign dynamic package free travel, theme-based project travel, domestic high-speed rail vacation travel, domestic bus travel, various European and Japanese railway ticket, visa, and other travel products. The company offers its services through its ezfly.com website. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
